data.title: Rio Tinto - M&A Summary and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Rio Tinto has acquired 8 companies, including 2 in the last 5 years. It has also divested 14 assets.
                Rio Tinto’s largest acquisition to date was in 2007, when it acquired Alcan for $38.1B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2017, when it
                        sold Coal & Allied Industries to Yancoal Australia for $2.5B. Rio Tinto has acquired in 1 US state, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include metals/mining (88%) and  oil/gas exploration (13%).
data.text:
Rio Tinto M&A Summary

Rio Tinto has acquired 8 companies, including 2 in the last 5 years. It has also divested 14 assets.

Rio Tinto’s largest acquisition to date was in 2007, when it acquired Alcan for $38.1B. It’s largest disclosed sale occurred in 2017, when it sold Coal & Allied Industries to Yancoal Australia for $2.5B. Rio Tinto has acquired in 1 US state, and 5 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include metals/mining (88%) and oil/gas exploration (13%).

Rio Tinto Business Overview
